VBOX:my_page                header_row          body            <>

( a comment line )
VBOX:header_row             row_a               row_b           row_c
                            row_d  (comment)    row_e (comment) row_f
                            row_g
QVBoxLayout:body (comment)  topic_a             topic_b         topic_c
Find:CustomLayout:custom_a  foo                 bar             baz
